question: Which statement do you relate to more?

A.desc: “Whatever that keeps the peace of the group man”

B.desc: “Peace begins with yourself. How am I supposed to help others without caring for my own well-being first?”

question: When faced with a new environment, how would you react?

A.desc: Find familiarity in my past experiences and adapt accordingly to what has been tried and tested before.

B.desc: Hmm I will just see how this goes and adapt accordingly.

question: After eating at a restaurant, you felt that the food was awesome. However, upon searching the reviews, it only had a 2.9 stars rating. How would you react?

A.desc: Oh did I order something wrong? Maybe the food wasn’t as good as I thought?

B.desc: Weird, the food was great though.

question: Which statement do you relate to more?

A.desc: I take information that I have gathered through my experiences and come up with a lot of different possibilities (e.g. brainstorming)

B.desc: I like to narrow down the observations I have gathered at the current moment to some kind of interpretation.

question: Do you recharge by spending time alone or being around people?
Do you prefer conversations that explore abstract ideas and one’s imagination or ones that focus on concrete and realistic topics?
There’s an upcoming trip! Do you prefer to at least have some sort of a plan or let’s just wing it?
When making decisions, do you rely more on logic or feelings?
